- [Women's poly Georgette Printed Party Wedding Fashion Gown](https://donedeals.xyz/products/womens-poly-georgette-printed-party-wedding-fashion-gown): Product Details Name : Women's poly Georgette Printed Party Wedding Fashion Gown Fabric : Poly Georgette Inner Fabric : Organza Bottom Fabric : Nylon Dupatta Fabric : Nylon Color : Green Bottom Color : Not Applicable Dupatta Color : Not Applicable Sleeve Length : Three-Quarter Sleeves Pattern : Printed Set Type : Single piece Net Quantity (N) : 1 A faux georgette gown is a type of dress made from a lightweight, flowy, and sheer fabric that mimics the look and texture of georgette, but is typically made from synthetic materials such as polyester or nylon. This fabric is often used to create elegant and formal gowns, as its lightness and drape make it easy to create soft, billowy silhouettes that move gracefully with the wearer. Faux georgette gowns can come in a variety of styles and designs, ranging from simple and understated to intricately embellished and ornate.
